scripts.start: nodemon --ext tsx --ext ts --ext scss --watch src --watch scripts --watch static --watch client --exec 'yarn run ssg:html && yarn run build:styles && yarn run build:client && parcel serve ./public/*.html'
scripts.build:styles: yarn run build:styles:index && yarn run build:styles:layout && yarn run build:styles:profile && yarn run build:styles:gallery
scripts.build:: yarn run build:styles && yarn run build:client && yarn run ssg:img && yarn run ssg:html && parcel build ./public/*.html
scripts.lint: eslint src/*/**.tsx && stylelint src/styles/**.scss && stylelint src/styles/*/**.scss
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix src/*/**.tsx && stylelint --fix src/styles/**.scss && stylelint --fix src/styles/*/**.scss
scripts.format: prettier src/*/**.tsx --write --config .prettierrc && prettier src/styles/**.scss --write --config .prettierrc && prettier src/styles/*/**.scss --write --config .prettierrc && yarn run lint:fix
scripts.build:client: parcel build ./client/main.ts --out-dir public && parcel build ./client/profile.ts --out-dir public && parcel build ./client/gallery.ts --out-dir public
